definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format Follow-Up Administration Version test name.

synonyms: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format Follow-Up Administration Version Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - In the last 2 weeks, how much of the time did you feel very confident and sure that you could deal with your illness?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Feel Confident to Deal With Illness

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks did you feel you had complete control of your breathing problems?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Had Control of Breathing Problems

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt embarrassed by your coughing or heavy breathing?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Embarrassed by Coughing

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How much energy have you had in the last 2 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Energy

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How about fatigue? How tired have you felt over the last 2 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Fatigue

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks did you feel relaxed and free of tension?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Feel Relaxed and Free of Tension
terms.submissionValue: CRQ02-Feel Relaxed and Free of Tension
synonyms: CRQ02-Feel Relaxed and Free of Tension

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks did you feel upset or scared when you had difficulty getting your breath?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Feel Upset When Had Difficulty Getting Breath

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - In general, how much of the time did you feel upset, worried, or depressed during the last 2 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Feel Upset, Worried or Depressed

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - Feeling emotional such as angry or upset.
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Feeling Emotional

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks did you have a feeling of fear or panic when you had difficulty getting your breath?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Feeling of Fear or Panic

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - In general, how often during the last 2 weeks have you felt discouraged or down in the dumps?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Felt Discouraged or Down

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - In general, how much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you felt frustrated or impatient?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Felt Frustrated or Impatient

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt low in energy?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Felt Low in Energy

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - In general, how often during the last 2 weeks have you felt restless, tense, or uptight?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Felt Restless, Tense or Uptight

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt worn out or sluggish?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Felt Worn Out or Sluggish

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - How happy, satisfied, or pleased have you been with your personal life during the last 2 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: CRQ-SAS Follow-Up Administration Version - Happy, Satisfied or Pleased With Life

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - Participating in social activities.

terms.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) Follow-up Administration Version - Performing chores.
